entry.string: Confirm deletion of the tag type
entry.translation: Confirmer la suppression de ce type de balise

entry.string: Warning! This will also remove all tags associated with the tag type!
entry.translation: Attention! Cela supprimera toutes les balises associées à ce type

entry.string: Cancel deletion of the tag type
entry.translation: Annuler la suppression de ce type de balise
